title: Groups File Lawsuit Challenging Trump EPA Final Rule That Delays Methane Pollution Protections from Oil and Gas Industry
description: Methane, the main component of natural gas, is a climate pollutant that is 80 times more powerful than carbon dioxide.
content: (Washington, D.C. December 4, 2025) Health, environment, and community groups have filed a lawsuit in the U.S. Court of Appeals for the D.C. Circuit challenging the Trump EPAs rushed and unlawful fin… [+7619 chars]
